page.title: 15LEISURE IN SUTTON
page.content: People in Sutton follow various leisure pursuits including golf, swimming,walking,gardening,sailing, squash & badminton.Apart from golf which is played on the John O' Gaunt course in Sutton,facilities for most activities are some distance away e.g. Biggleswade,Bedford,Letchworth and surrounding places. In the village itself,there are several clubs which meet from time to time.The Over 60's Club is for senior ciizens of Sutton,Dunton & Eyeworth who meet monthly at Dunton.Sutton's Social Club has a hall which can be used by villagers for parties etc.. A Summer Fete and Christmas Bazaar help to raise funds for the upkeep of the hall. There is a Women's Institute which meets monthly for talks and demonstrations on many subjects.
